name: Christmas Market
description:
A fun point-and-click adventure about last minute Christmas shopping! Join Ellen and her friend Kim as they rush out on New Year's Eve to grab their gifts!

Featuring an interactive environment and inventory system that allows you to combine objects and play with your surroundings!

Published 12/31/22 - will be fully completed by 1/3/22 - CHECK BACK FOR UPDATES!

Game made in RenPy
Art made in Procreate
Brush set - Bardot Pixel Art
Music made in GarageBand


All assets made by TechnoAthena of Polias Games
